pullRequest.title: LocalNodeMasterListener is a regular listener
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit makes the LocalNodeMasterListener interface extend the
ClusterStateListener interface and use a default implementation for
detecting whether the local node master status changed.

commit.message:
LocalNodeMasterListener is a regular listener

This commit makes the LocalNodeMasterListener interface extend the
ClusterStateListener interface and use a default implementation for
detecting whether the local node master status changed.

nodes.bodyText: NIT: Maybe move this to our standard style of == false and also cache final boolean wasMaster = event.previousState().nodes().isLocalNodeElectedMaster() to make it a little shorter?
